title: U.S., U.K. Prepare Plans to Sanction Russian Oligarchs, Businesses
sub_head: Washington is drafting a list of Kremlin allies that could be blacklisted if Russia invades Ukraine, and the U.K. is proposing a new sanctions law
body:
The U.S. and U.K. governments plan to target Russian oligarchs and businesses connected to the Kremlin as part of a broad sanctions effort designed to punish Moscow in case Russia invades Ukraine.
Senior U.S. officials said the administration is drafting a list of Russian officials and businessmen allied with Russian President Vladimir Putin that Washington plans to blacklist as part of its broader package of economic sanctions and export controls.
